content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
NEUTRAL regime â€” normal volatility (Vol: 26.0%) with very narrow participation (Breadth: 0/8 sectors positive); watch for divergence between index and internals.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
No sector is positive on 1W; relative leaders are Energy & Chemicals led by TRMET (1W: +8.77% | 1M: +17.19%) ABOVE TREND and Heavy Industry led by EREGL (1W: +5.87% | 1M: +14.36%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Worst on 1W are Transportation and Construction/REITs; Transportation exemplified by THYAO (1W: -6.47% | 1M: +4.33%) CORRECTION and Construction by TKFEN (1W: -9.47% | 1M: +4.62%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
TRMET (1W: +8.77% | 1M: +17.19%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +8.46% | 1M: +11.19%) ABOVE TREND; EREGL (1W: +5.87% | 1M: +14.36%) ABOVE TREND; ENKAI (1W: +2.31% | 1M: +20.62%) ABOVE TREND; SOKM (1W: +1.55% | 1M: +9.70%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
HEKTS (1W: -11.53% | 1M: -6.12%) BELOW TREND; TSKB (1W: -10.44% | 1M: -3.20%) BELOW TREND; TKFEN (1W: -9.47% | 1M: +4.62%) CORRECTION; SASA (1W: -8.85% | 1M: -4.05%) BELOW TREND; AEFES (1W: -7.63% | 1M: +9.50%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
Up-momentum: TRMET (1W: +8.77% | 1M: +17.19%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +8.46% | 1M: +11.19%) ABOVE TREND; down-momentum: HEKTS (1W: -11.53% | 1M: -6.12%) BELOW TREND, TSKB (1W: -10.44% | 1M: -3.20%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -9.47% | 1M: +4.62%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banking is mixed-to-weak 1W (-1.98%) despite strong 1M (+10.43%); AKBNK (1W: +0.55% | 1M: +14.39%) ABOVE TREND and YKBNK (1W: +0.05% | 1M: +16.82%) ABOVE TREND show leadership while TSKB (1W: -10.44% | 1M: -3.20%) BELOW TREND is a clear laggard.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy Industry shows bifurcation: EREGL (1W: +5.87% | 1M: +14.36%) ABOVE TREND is a momentum leader while ARCLK (1W: -7.11% | 1M: +5.13%) CORRECTION and FROTO (1W: -5.49% | 1M: +7.23%) CORRECTION are under pressure.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Energy is polarized: TRMET (1W: +8.77% | 1M: +17.19%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +8.46% | 1M: +11.19%) ABOVE TREND outperform while SASA (1W: -8.85% | 1M: -4.05%) BELOW TREND and HEKTS (1W: -11.53% | 1M: -6.12%) BELOW TREND drag the group.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Neutral tactical stance: trim weak momentum losers and idiosyncratic risk (HEKTS, TSKB, SASA, TKFEN) and selectively add to high-quant leaders and momentum winners (TRMET, TRALT, EREGL, AKBNK) while keeping overall beta contained given narrow breadth.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
TRMET (1W: +8.77% | 1M: +17.19%) ABOVE TREND for momentum follow-through; EREGL (1W: +5.87% | 1M: +14.36%) ABOVE TREND for cyclicals; AKBNK (1W: +0.55% | 1M: +14.39%) ABOVE TREND for banking flow; TKFEN (1W: -9.47% | 1M: +4.62%) CORRECTION as a potential mean-reversion candidate.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Banking & Finance for liquidity-led moves, Energy & Chemicals for commodity/earnings swings, Heavy Industry for momentum continuation or reversal.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 reaction to 20-day vs 50-day moving averages (hold 20-day = risk-on; failure to hold 50-day = broader risk-off); catalysts: CBRT guidance, FX moves, global oil/commodity shifts, and company-level earnings/flows.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
NEUTRAL market: normal volatility (26.0%) but no sector breadth (0/8), so index strength is narrow. Trade selectively: favor high-quant and momentum leaders (TRMET, TRALT, EREGL, AKBNK) and trim idiosyncratic weak names (HEKTS, TSKB, SASA) until breadth returns.
